name: Top Rescue Super Heli Operation
description:
This helicopter game is unique helicopter rescue 3d simulator for multiple rescue missions.Fly your rescue helicopter in huge environments.Hold the controls of rescue helicopter and be a trained pilot with army helicopter driving games and get ready for some exciting emergency helicopter rescue missions with your army helicopter games real missions.You will get the chance of showing some extreme flying stunts in your army helicopter.Take this opportunity to become a real super flying hero of 2017 and rescue innocent civilians in emergency situation.
In this game,become the part of the world's top Heli rescue gamer with a twist of the helicopter transport game.Fly around and see the sights.Play as the rescue helicopter and save the precious lives of the people through your Heli driving and flying expertise.
Risk your life as a real helicopter flying hero.Fly the transport copter and improve your helicopter transporting skills.Drive the police helicopter to enhance your cop Heli driving skills.Get ready for the most challenging and more exciting military,cop, firefighter and rescue missions in this city flying pilot modern helicopter rescue flight sim 3D 2017.Practice the helicopter flying skills first on the wide hill area.Just learn how to control the huge Heli and then choose the desired mission.
The chopper rescue mission of the helicopter will be hard,as you will have to land properly in the emergency area.You will fly multiple types of helicopters like rescue chopper, fire fighter Heli, transport Heli and fighter Heli to fire missiles on the bad guys.Your task is different in every mission,so this awesome game will not bore you.
Quality HD graphics,wonderful & amazing 3D environment,easy and smooth controls, cool animations and realistic sounds will make the game best.
Features:
-Realistic flying simulation
-High quality chopper
-Exciting Helicopter Rescue Missions
-High Quality 3D Graphics and Engaging Sound Effects
-Easy To Control Simulator Controls
